Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

--[[ Fixed by ArceusInator. Uses new spawning that works no matter where the player is. Fixed teamkilling. --]]
local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local GLib = require(206209239)
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
Tool.Enabled = true
local dollClone local dollFire local dollModel
local prevHealth = 100
local connection
local ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Shape = "Ball" ray.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) ray.CanCollide = false ray.Transparency = 0.0
local bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" bullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" bullet.Parent = ray bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local shootSound local alienSound
local attacking = false
function follow() local stopped = false local bv if dollClone then bv = dollClone:FindFirstChild("FollowBV") end while dollClone and dollModel and myTorso and bv do local distance = (myTorso.Position - dollClone.Position).magnitude if distance > 5.0 then stopped = false dollClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(dollClone.Position, myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, dollClone.Position.Y - myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) bv.Parent = dollClone if distance > 8.0 then bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - dollClone.Position).unit * 20.0 + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) else bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - dollClone.Position).unit * 20.0 * (distance/24) + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) end else if not stopped then stopped = true bv.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) dollClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) bv.Parent = nil end end wait() end Doll.Transparency = 0.0 end
function blow(ray, hit) local owner, target = GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(script), GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(hit)
if ray and hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter and not GLib.IsTeammate(owner, target) then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(30) if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.Health + 5 <= myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + 5 end end end end
function shoot(torso) if dollClone == nil then return end shootSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShootSound") if shootSound then shootSound:Play() end local direction = (torso.Position - dollClone.Position).unit
local spawnPos = dollClone.Position + direction * 3.0
local rayC = ray:Clone() rayC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) rayC.Velocity = direction * 50.0
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, rayC:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) float.Parent = rayC
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = rayC fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 153/255, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 51/255, 0)
rayC.Parent = game.Workspace
rayC.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rayC, hit) end) debris:AddItem(rayC, 5.0) end
function attack() if myHumanoid == nil then return end if myHumanoid.Health < prevHealth and dollClone and not attacking then prevHealth = myHumanoid.Health local owner = GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(myHumanoid) if owner then local playr = owner if playr:IsA("Player") then local character = playr.Character if character and (character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) then attacking = true local torso = character.Torso print(1) shoot(torso) attacking = false end end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
connection = myHumanoid.HealthChanged:connect(attack)
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
if dollClone == nil then
Tool.Enabled = false
alienSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("AlienSound") if alienSound then alienSound:Play() end
dollModel = Instance.new("Model") dollModel.Name = "DollModel"
dollClone = Doll:Clone() dollClone.CanCollide = false dollClone.Parent = dollModel dollClone.Name = "AlienVoodoo" dollModel.Parent = vCharacter
Doll.Transparency = 1.0
dollFire = Instance.new("Fire") dollFire.Parent = dollClone dollFire.Color = Color3.new(0, 153/255, 0) dollFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 51/255, 0)
-- dollClone.CFrame = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, math.pi/2) * (myTorso.CFrame - myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0) + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) -- dollClone.CFrame = dollClone.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) dollClone.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 20, 20) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0)
local dollFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") dollFloat.Name = "DollFloat" dollFloat.Parent = dollClone dollFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, dollClone:GetMass() * 196, 0)
local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "FollowBV" bv.Parent = dollClone bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(50000, 50000, 50000) bv.P = 50000
dollCo = coroutine.create(follow) coroutine.resume(dollCo) else -- make the doll Attack attack() end
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if dollClone then dollClone:Destroy() dollClone = nil end if dollModel then dollModel:Destroy() dollModel = nil end Doll.Transparency = 0.0 if connection then connection:disconnect() end if shootSound then shootSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid
function swap(key) if key:lower() == "q" and myTorso then local dollModel = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("DollModel") local dollClone = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("AlienVoodoo") if dollClone then myTorso.CFrame = dollClone.CFrame dollClone:Destroy() end if dollModel then dollModel:Destroy() end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(swap) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
